meaning_str.bing:
n. 睡眠；睡眠时间；眼眵
v. 睡；入睡；为…提供床位
网络. 睡觉；休眠；静止

睡觉；睡眠；睡眠时间；一段睡眠时间；一觉
睡觉；安眠；入睡；为…提供住宿；（与某人）发生性关系

1.en: A lioness lets out a mighty yawn to shake away the sleep and be ready for the wildebeests which were headed in the direction of the pride.
1.cn: 一头母狮打了一个有力的哈欠，它的睡眠被催醒了，准备面对着骄傲地朝着它方向的角马。

2.en: To be able to sit by the bed of another, watching him sleep, waiting for nothing else, is to understand where else we might be.
2.cn: 坐在别人的床边，注视着他入眠，别无所求，就可以理解我们可能在的别处。

3.en: Stress, mental fatigue and exhaustion can be a result of your work, family life, conflict, or even a lack of good quality sleep.
3.cn: 压力，心力疲惫和精疲力竭可能是由你的工作，家庭生活，冲突，甚至是缺乏良好睡眠引起的。

0.en: Sheldon, when was the last time you got any sleep?
0.cn: 谢尔顿，你上次睡觉是什么年代？

1.en: Sleep. When Old Nick came. I want to see Ma.
1.cn: 睡觉，每次老尼克来的时候，我想妈妈了。

2.en: You think when she goes to sleep she counts herself?
2.cn: 你觉得她睡觉的时候会数自己吗？

3.en: I dozed off. You breathe so deep when you sleep.
3.cn: 我刚刚睡着了。你睡觉的时候呼吸很沉。

4.en: What time do you go to sleep? Or do you go to sleep at different times?
4.cn: 你们几点睡觉？还是你们睡觉时间不同？

5.en: Okay, but only if you promise to go straight back to sleep. We'll go to sleep after the story.
5.cn: 好的，但你们两个一定要保证听完马上就睡觉。我们会睡觉的，只要你给我们讲故事。

6.en: Of course, the rhinos sleep standing up. I don't think I'd be very good at that.
6.cn: 当然了，犀牛是站着睡觉的，我觉得站着睡觉我可能不行。

7.en: Time for bed. Where will we sleep? Mummy Pig and I will sleep on this bed. And you two will sleep upstairs.
7.cn: 该睡觉咯。我们睡在哪里呢？你妈妈和我睡在这张床上。你们两个睡在楼上。

8.en: And I just realized I can sleep with my eyes open.
8.cn: 我刚发现我能睁着眼睛睡觉。

9.en: So you wanna go to sleep now? In a little bit.
9.cn: 你现在想去睡觉了吗？等一会儿吧。

10.en: But, you know when you want to go to sleep, you want some space.
10.cn: 不过当你想睡觉时，你会想要一点空间。

11.en: You have to sleep with one eye open for the rest of your life.
11.cn: 你的余生恐怕都得睁一只眼闭一只眼睡觉了。

12.en: Good night kittens, close your eyes. Sleep in peace until you rise.
12.cn: 宝贝们晚安 闭上眼睡觉觉 一觉睡到大天亮

13.en: How can you sleep? I'm not done making you feel better.
13.cn: 你怎么能睡觉呢？为了让你感觉好点，我还有好多事要做呢。

14.en: Because you want me to grow out of this? Because I want to sleep.
14.cn: 你是想让我通过这件事情长大吗？我是想要睡觉。

15.en: I just watched her sleep for like hours, just breathing in and breathing out.
15.cn: 我看着她睡觉看了好久，就这样吸气，吐气。

16.en: Do you need to do press-ups? No. I need to sleep and dream about puddles. It is the day of the big puddle jump.
16.cn: 那你需要练习俯卧撑吗。不，我需要练习睡觉，然后睡觉做梦梦见泥坑。今天是跳泥坑大赛的日子。

17.en: We eat here. We sleep here. We grow our own food. We build our own shelter.
17.cn: 在这里吃饭，睡觉，种植粮食，建立防御工事。

18.en: Really? 'Cause I think it's saying, I'm fine. Go back to sleep."
18.cn: 真的吗? 我怎么觉得它说的是"我好着呢 你们回去睡觉吧"。

19.en: Please, Penny, enough. I have to sleep. Okay, well, you were great. Thanks.
19.cn: 拜托，佩妮，够了，我得睡觉了。好吧，你真强，谢谢。
